contents.text: Welcome to SnapLogic, powering digital business transformation with automated application, data, and cloud integration.
For Sales and Account Services, press 1.
To speak with our Sales team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a SnapLogic sales specialist.

navigationGoals: Get enterprise integration pricing and licensing details
I’d like to learn about pricing and any veteran discounts for a new SnapLogic subscription.
I’d like to discuss enterprise pricing tiers and API throughput limits for our upcoming integration project.
I need to understand pricing for renewing my integration service.
Explore licensing and pricing options for integrating my lab’s experimental data workflows.

contents.text: To reach your Account Manager, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to your SnapLogic account team.

navigationGoals: Discuss my upcoming subscription renewal with my account manager
I’m calling to review my existing contract and discuss veteran-specific renewal benefits.
I need to review and adjust our subscription plan, including seat counts and renewal terms.
I have a question about a charge on my latest invoice.
Review my existing account details and upgrade my student integration plan.

contents.text: For Technical Support and Customer Success, press 2.
For integration assistance and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a SnapLogic support engineer.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot the data sync error in our integration pipeline
I need help troubleshooting my integration pipeline to meet security compliance standards.
I’m troubleshooting a pipeline error with REST Snaps and need help debugging a JSON schema mismatch.
I need step-by-step help setting up a new app connection.
Get assistance troubleshooting my pipeline that imports spectrometer data into AWS storage.

contents.text: To check system status and alerts, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve the latest system updates for you.

navigationGoals: Check current system uptime and any active service alerts
Can you give me the current system status and any active alerts before I start my deployment?
I want to check the current health status and active alerts for our US-West data integration instance.
Can you tell me if there are any current service outages or alerts?
Check for any system outages or alerts affecting my scheduled data workflows.
